posts.post_content:
$63 shipped within the US

These are the new GAI cases.  I don't trust GAI anymore than anyone else, but these look like nice 2s.  Not altered in anyway, and nice eye appeal.  Fairly tough back to track down if you are looking for specific players, or working on the subset.

Also, fwiw (not much probably :D) I like the look of the holder.  Like a less bulky, more transparent BVG holder.
